msbt.message: Hi there! Would you like to do a treasure hunt with me?
Sure!
Sorry, I'm busy.
You look like you're in the mood todo a TREASURE HUNT!
Possibly.
Not particularly?
Hi! Want to do a treasure hunt?
Let's do it!
No, thanks.
'K! So, it's like this I'm going to bury treasure somewhere on this island.Relax. I've got the digging permits.Anyhoo, hang tight here for a sec, and I'll do the whole burying thing.
I'm so going to bury treasure somewhere on the island! Wait here a sec, 'K?
Alright, I'm going to bury treasure somewhere on the island!
Ugh It's getting kind of late. It'd be really hard to see. AndI'm kind of worried about vampiresSo let's do this some other time!
'K Maybe some other time!
Well, let's play some other time!
OK Well, we should play sometime. It's crazy fun!

'K! Here's the rules!<10_7 arg="60" />If you find the treasure I hid before your time is upyou win! It's just! That! Easy!<10_7 arg="60" />Now, I can only bury things outside since folks get mad when you dig up their floors. So stay outside!<10_7 arg="60" />OK THE! HUNT! IS! ON!<10_7 arg="120" />

OK! Then here's the rules!<10_7 arg="60" />If you can find the treasure I hid on the island before time runs out, you win, !<10_7 arg="90" />I can only bury things outside, so no need to go inside any buildings!<10_7 arg="90" />Oh, and, like, this is just OUR game, so no help from any of your friends! Got it? Good!<10_7 arg="90" /> OK, here we go, !<10_7 arg="120" />

OK! Then here are the rulesâ€”and they're easy! Because they're the SAME RULES AS LAST TIME, YAY!<10_7 arg="60" /> Find the treasure before the time runs out. That's it! EXCEPT! There's less TIME thisum, time.<10_7 arg="60" /> Alright? THE! HUNT! IS! ON!<10_7 arg="90" />

OK! Then here's the rules!<10_7 arg="60" />If you can find the treasure I hid on the island before time runs out, you win, !<10_7 arg="90" />There's less time this time, so it could be un petit more difficult!<10_7 arg="90" />Oh, and, like, this is just OUR game, so no help from any of your friends! Got it? Good!<10_7 arg="90" /> 'K, here we go, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Need me to explain the rules?
Yes.
Nope.
'K, then! Let's go!<10_7 arg="90" />
OK then! Oh! Right! And you can't get help from anyone else. This is all you, . Got it?<10_7 arg="120" /> 'K, let's go, !<10_7 arg="90" />
OK! There's less time this time, so move fast! Alright THE! HUNT! IS! ON!<10_7 arg="90" />

'K! There's less time this time, so no goofing around. You have to hurry!<10_7 arg="120" />Oh! Right! And you can't get help from anyone else, 'K? This is all on you! Got it? Good!<10_7 arg="120" /> Alright, here we go, !<10_7 arg="90" />
Hey, are you, like, free right now? You want to do some treasure hunting?
Sure!
Not right now.

Oh! Hey, . Listen for a second!I feel like, if every day of my life was full of excitement, it'd make me a way more awesome pop starSo, how about you and me, we do a treasure hunt and turn this day from mildinto POP-STAR WILD?
Let's do it!
Some other time.
Oh, lame! It's actually super late! Sorry, we need to do this some other time!
Yaaaaay! 'K, wait here just a sec while I go bury some treasure!I've thought about it for a week, and I think I've found the perfect place!
'K, that's totally cool! Let's do something some other time, !
Oh, wow. Look at how late it is! It's way too dark, huh?Do you have opinions on werethings? Werefish, werebugs, werefolksthat kind of stuff?Because I do! And I think it's WAY too late to be outside!
Yaaaay! I knew you'd say yes, !'K! I'm going to go bury some treasure somewhere on the island! Ahh! I'm already super excited!
That's too bad. I'll ask you again some other time, .
I looked everywhere, but all the places where I usually bury things are full of things I've buried.I know I asked you to do this and all, but let's play another time!
